amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the $3,420,000 in funding for the Open World Leadership Center and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 113-426 to defund the Open World Leadership Center Trust Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Duffy.
